mapper.select: SELECT p.id , p.name,p.article_count,p.introduce,p.cover_url, p.gust_count, p.recent_user_count, u.username as create_username, u.id as create_user_id,m.id as main_music_info, m.wangyi_id as main_music_id,t.name as music_type_name, t.id as styleId FROM music_pool p left join `user` u on p.create_user_id = u.id left join music_info m on p.main_music_info = m.id left join music_style t on p.music_type_id = t.id order by p.gust_count desc

SELECT p.id, p.name,p.article_count,p.introduce,p.cover_url, p.gust_count, p.recent_user_count, u.username as create_username, u.id as create_user_id,m.id as main_music_info, m.wangyi_id as main_music_id,t.name as music_type_name, t.id as styleId FROM music_pool p left join `user` u on p.create_user_id = u.id left join music_info m on p.main_music_info = m.id left join music_style t on p.music_type_id = t.id WHERE t.id = #{styleId, jdbcType = BIGINT} ORDER BY p.gust_count DESC
